title: Easy quesadillas
ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into cubes', 'Salt and Pepper', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '200g spreadable cream cheese, like Philadelphia', '1 300g jar of salsa', '8 large flour tortillas', '2 green peppers, thinly sliced', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', '250g (8 oz) grated Cheddar cheese']
